units.title: Seed cells on day ‑4
units.text: On d-4, 5,000 cells are seeded per well of an ultra-low attachment 96-U-well plate, followed by centrifugation to form one hPSC aggregate per well (Steps 10–13).
units.rationale: Initiates the preculture and aggregate formation.

units.title: Centrifuge plate to form aggregates
units.text: 13 Centrifuge the plate at 300g and 4 °C for 3 min to bring the cells to the culture plate bottom, and place the plate into the incubator.
units.rationale: Ensures a single round aggregate per well.

units.title: Prepare Matrigel for embedding
units.text: 14 Before you start, take out the required amount of Matrigel aliquots from the freezer and let them thaw on ice. When the Matrigel is thawed, insert the aliquots into the ice. Take out the sterile scissors (heated to at least 180 °C for at least 3 h), and let them cool down at room temperature.
units.rationale: Readies the matrix for embedding hPSC aggregates.

units.title: Check and select aggregates for embedding
units.text: 15 In the meantime, take a look at the 96-U-well plate under the microscope to check if the hPSC aggregates have properly formed. Mark the properly formed aggregates (these will be further embedded in Matrigel) and cross out the rest (not round or too small aggregates; see Fig. 4b for examples; these aggregates can be discarded later).
units.rationale: Selects only correctly formed aggregates for downstream steps.

units.title: Add CHIR99021 for early differentiation
units.rationale: Activates WNT signaling to initiate cardiac lineage specification.

units.title: Add IWP2 for later differentiation
units.rationale: Inhibits WNT signaling to promote cardiac maturation.

units.title: Daily medium change after seeding
units.text: Change the medium after 2 d and then daily by aspirating the medium and adding 5 mL of fresh E8.
units.rationale: Maintains nutrient supply and removes waste.

units.title: Passage hPSCs in monolayer culture
units.text: 2 Take the conﬂuent T25 ﬂask (Fig. 3b; conﬂuency is typically reached 2–4 d after seeding), aspirate the medium and add 5 mL of PBS w/o. Aspirate the PBS w/o, add 1 mL of Accutase and place the plate into the incubator.
units.rationale: Harvests cells for subsequent seeding or differentiation.

units.title: Count cells and assess viability
units.text: 5 Count the cells and assess the cell viability by applying Trypan blue staining in a hemocytometer using standard methods (and previously described33).
units.rationale: Ensures accurate seeding density and healthy cells.

units.title: Prepare stock cell suspension for seeding
units.text: 11 Prepare a stock cell suspension at a concentration of 5,000 cells per 100 µL medium by adding an appropriate amount of cells from Step 10 (based on the desired number of HFOs) to E8 + 10 μM Y27632. Gently resuspend the cells.
units.rationale: Creates a defined inoculum for uniform HFO formation.
